website_summaries.verdict: A beef bone broth protein powder that contains no extra carbohydrates or sugar and may help heal the gut.
pros: Includes 21 g of protein per scoop
Tasteless, which means the powder is easy to incorporate into hot and cold drinks
Provides great texture and froth when the powder is used as part of a smoothie
cons: Neutral flavor leaves much to be desired
Must be mixed with liquid in a blender to avoid clumps

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless and extremely good for health
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I like the way it has absolutely no taste whatsoever and that after a few weeks I started feeling a much better overall health. This product is not a miracle, but it will improve your health little by little. I don't know if organic is the way to go and pay 50% more than the non-organic, but right now I am going thru health issues and I prefer to give my body the best I can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Black Rhino

customer_reviews.title: I had a bleeding ulcer and by adding this to ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a bleeding ulcer and by adding this to my smoothies. My ulcer healed up in a month with this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Best! Organic! Grass-fed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find this organic beef bone broth from grass-fed, pasture raised cows certified by POC. (POC also certifies the organic 100% grass-fed certified yogurt I eat!) Easy to mix if you follow directions. I mix with water in a small blender (made for smoothies). The foam eventually is gone. Use in my veggie meals. I store what's left in the blender bottle in the refrigerator to use for 3 more days. I was a little concerned about the taste since I don't eat red meat. If anything, my meals taste better! Plus glad to be getting collagen and other nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bone broth. Very pure and no added fillers. Much better tasting than the Dr. Axe stuff I was buying before and organic. I use it in my morning smoothie or in a shaker cup if I'm on the go. I've bought 4 jars so far and plan to continue. My only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the cost. Using it twice a day it only lasts me about 2 weeks. Quite expensive, but you get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product upset my stomach too much and I was not able to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is horribly mislabeled. This product is deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: The label shows Total fat content >1g and calcium >1g. Which company labels their food products that way? The fat content could be 10g or 20 g. The reason I mention this is that I have difficulty digesting fats and oils. Taking small amounts of this product caused my digestive system to fail so that I could no longer have meat, beans and other proteins except grains, or fats and oils. I had to discontinue the product and took me sometime to figure out that this product was a major culprit. If the company can be deceptive in labeling, I wonder what the product actually contains. Do not buy this product or anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily Dissolves
customer_reviews.text: This organic grass fed beef bone broth really does not have much of a taste which is fine with me. I make a cup every morning & after, i just add one scoop to my mug then add hot water and stir vigorously for 30 seconds or so and it’s dissolve, then I just sip like tea. I cannot comment on any health benefits yet I’ve only been drinking it for 2-days. The container states it’s 20 servings, I think it’s a bit pricey but if I receive great health benefits it may be worth it. Will have to follow-up later about the health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: For coffee, get an immersion blender. It will make you love this powder even more.
customer_reviews.text: I love my bone broth powder for the added protein and for all those having a problem when mixing with coffee, etc., buy an immersion blender. It used to take me forever to mix this in my coffee, stirring and stirring to get all the clumps out. Then I bought a Chefman immersion blender and it mixes it in like a dream and gives a glorious froth to my black coffee. My husband loves the blender too because he uses it to froth his creamer.
customer_reviews.author: R Squared

customer_reviews.title: Good Powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bone broth powder. I thought at first it might taste beefy but it doesn't. I add it to my coffee in the morning along with MCT oil and a little stevia. It is a bit more work to get it blended but don't mind because I feel I'm getting a better product that doesn't contain additives. I feel this product is benefiting my gut and joint health. I'm gaining in flexibility and strength when I stretch and do strength exercises which is important as I am an active 63 yr old woman.
customer_reviews.author: Wyo girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Bone Broth Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product! I am so thankful to have a bone broth protein powder to use in my daily smoothies that is not only pure in ingredients, it is grass fed and organic! I was devastated to learn I was struggling with leaky guy type symptoms and in need of switching out my organic vegan protein powders for a bone broth variety, thinking finding organic would be impossible. This is perfect. Thank you, Left Coast Performance!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B

customer_reviews.title: and that I am surprised at what a great source of protein it is
customer_reviews.text: It is early in my use, so I cannot yet claim any health benefits, but I can say two things -- it blends well into smoothies I make, even though that are fruit based, and that I am surprised at what a great source of protein it is. I was looking more for the alkaline effects and the minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Billiam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It's so great to finally have a protein powder that is just pure protein without a bunch of stuff added to it. It's so great to be able to make a smoothie and have a protein that is so easy to assimilate. There's no bad aftertaste and it's virtually tasteless so it just adds health to my smoothie without any weird taste. Plus, the customer service and communication was awesome. I had trouble opening my jar and they were extremely responsive and handled my issue immediately. 5 stars for this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: monica hershaft

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This product has a terrible taste for me. Also it’s incredibly foamy, unless blended with hot water. I switched to traders joe liquid bone broth and I’m very happy with it. Almost nice to drink in the morning. I gave 2 stars bc it is a matter of taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Mild tasting.  Easy to drink.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well to put in coffee with a little vanilla. But I no longer can have coffee so I just put in pan and heat until all is dissolved. It’s very mild tasting. Easy to drink every morning. I have a leaky gut and it does help calm my stomach down. I would def give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to blend it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I always search for the cleanest protein powders. I follow the Keto eating plan and blend the protein with coconut oil and heavy cream in my coffee every morning! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Devonne Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Was told by company it is not 100% grassfed ,,I’m so tired of investigating true information
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: it's beef broth powder
customer_reviews.text: It's beef broth powder. It's disgusting. It doesn't dissolve in milk with a spoon. Stir and drink quickly. You don't buy this kind of powder for the flavor or the enjoyment of consuming it. You buy it because you want the benefits of bone broth. It's not bad if you mix it in a blender with milk, frozen yogurt, and maybe some kind of chocolate syrup or something.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this product. The tub seems to be great quality with a nice label. There is a scoop inside, I didn't have to search too much to find it. It blends well with my hand immersion blender! I tried it with a small $8 little drink mixer and it worked decent but had some chunks that remained unmixed. Thankfully I had the hand mixer though! We are very happy and will likely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: 100% Beef Broth.....Organic!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this product is 100% bone broth as well as organic. NaturalNews labs testing facility tested this product for contaminates and pesticides and gave it one of the cleanest out there as well as only a few handful which as well passed their testing. I love the slightly salty taste! I could easily consume tablespoons at a time but have to watch my budget. For some reason I don't see many 100% beef broth ingredients out there that is organic. Highly recommended from a picky consumer!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Drahota

customer_reviews.title: Spend alittle more and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This by far is my favorite bone broth. Quality organic ingredients. Makes my body feel the best. It’s a little pricey so I haven’t bought it in awhile and but I can tell a difference! I bought regular ancient nutrition and the taste isn’t as good and I don’t feel as good. Will come back to this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kent

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this for the health benefits but...
customer_reviews.text: the taste is just horrible for a supposedly "unflavored" product. I'm choking it down in my regular smoothie which includes wheat grass and spinach...but likely won't buy again. I'm going to try adding berries to see if that mask the unflavored-flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha T.

customer_reviews.title: pure, grass fed, organic
customer_reviews.text: great product. i have only been using for a a couple of weeks but i really am enjoying it compared to other protein powders that i have used. if using in shakes or smoothies, blend your ingredients as usual (high speed blender) and then add your protein powder slowly (at a slower speed if possible) at the end for about 5-7 and it will blend thoroughly without much foam.
customer_reviews.author: kate e.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bone broth protein powder for years and the Left Coast Performance unflavored power is hands down the best one on the market. It mixes well, has a smooth texture and has zero aftertaste. It is the only one that my kids will take in their smoothies! Thats a huge win after many failures of past brands. I recommend this product to all my friends. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve tried a few collagen powders from Bulletproof to Dr Axe to Vital Proteins to ones I’ve found in Canada and this is by far the best tasting. Blends perfectly in my morning match :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Organic Vanilla Bone Broth Powder for healing my digestive system and supporting my protein intake during the day. I usually mix a scoop with berries and almond milk and I have found this to be easy and delicious. I would recommend this product over other protein powders that contain guar gum, or other ingredients that might be unnecessary or irritating to the body.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: They offer a 50% discount on second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but probably the best one can get as well. It's awesome that, at least at the time of this writing, they offer a nice discount. That "unflavored" flavor is actually awesome. It feels like a creamy bone broth, not anything else, and it seems to fit whatever I add it to, be it butter-chocolate-coffee, a protein shake, or a fruit smoothy.
customer_reviews.author: kedlr

customer_reviews.title: Builds your body up.
customer_reviews.text: I have my big meal at lunch so for supper I add two scoops of this along with two scoops of collagen to my homemade bone broth along with boron- do your research- and I sleep like a baby. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Renie

customer_reviews.title: Great bone broth!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this bone broth a few times and I'm really happy with it. I've also used it throughout my pregnancy and I believe it has been beneficial to my health routine. It also tastes great, which I'm amazed by because I've tried bone broth type products before and it's not a pleasant taste. Definitely a returning customer!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana K

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for several days and it seems to be settling my stomach (I have the first signs of an ulcer). I will be updating this review once I've finished my first container.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Prime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored is tough to swallow
customer_reviews.text: You can tell right away that this is a quality product. While I don't like my smoothies on the sweet side the unflavored is going to far in the other direction.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Maloof

customer_reviews.title: We love the bone broth powder
customer_reviews.text: We love the bone broth powder! My husband and I found bone broth a bit difficult to prepare and use. A smoothie with your powder is a perfect substitute for us. I appreciate the care you take to communicate with your customers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Majoch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and organic!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Did the research, this is the best. Had the non-organic first, the ORGANIC IS FAR SUPERIOR. Worth the price. They will send you a 50% off code for your next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it mixed with other juices.Both my wife and I have notice improved health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Mannyboy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was skeptical on purchasing this product due to the price. Being a breast cancer survivor I am working on using as much organic products as possible. This was delicious easy to use and I love it in my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Verdicchio

customer_reviews.title: the best and purest bone broth out there
customer_reviews.text: we love it we drink it every day and it really helps with pains and aches. We tried different brands and none can compare to this one
customer_reviews.author: Abram E Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly being unflavored I totally expected a beefy tone to it. This product is awesome. It’s completely undetectable in my morning protein shake. I’m so glad I found it and started using it to help my poor gut heal from so many food intolerances that I have. Thank you for making this awesome product. Forever buying it.
customer_reviews.author: rldens

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in smoothies for my 9 yr old and myself. We use ice cubes and frozen bananas, and some sort of non dairy milk, along with a scoop of the broth powder and a tbls of no sugar added sunbutter. (you can use a nut butter-he's allergic) sometimes we add cacao nibs. it's delicious!!! No sweeteners, taste great and so good for you!
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Tase horrible
customer_reviews.text: Clumps but that would not bother me .. But omg the taste is horrible.. so bad I can’t explain. Taste fake and tase like burned skin .. I love homemade bone broth and I also buy frozen broth . This is NoTHING like it .. I will return..
customer_reviews.author: FiAGM

customer_reviews.title: Organic Bone broth "finally"!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I am finally able to find a certified organic bone broth. Seemed to take for every to find. It works great in my smoothes and does not add any weird or heavy taste to them..
customer_reviews.author: olulpana

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me full and nourished.
customer_reviews.text: Great protein powder. I love the unflavored version since it can mix with anything and knowing it's organic is certainly reassuring. While it does not blend very well unless placed in a blender I really do not mind since I just skim off the top and eat it. I use it every morning as part of a smoothie for breakfast which keeps me full and nourished till lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: S. Forde

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LETTLE TASTE
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PRODUCT LITTLE FLAVOR SO MIXES WELL IN FRUIT JUICE
customer_reviews.author: doc c

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware if your looking for less calories...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this packs a serious protein punch w/out the calories however, the flavor is down right AWFUL!!! ( I’ve had A LOT of different proteins). I added chocolate milk, blueberries and yogurt which made this MUCH better,almost delish, just added calories.
customer_reviews.author: shawny girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended drinking bone broth, but drinking beef bone broth did not appeal to me at first. I tried a couple products and hated them. Then I found this product with good reviews so I thought I would try it. It is awesome. I’m now craving it. The has a great flavor, like a sirloin or filet minion. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Faucher

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many and this is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I use this protein powder every morning blended in hot almond milk with an array of adaptogens. I also put it into my kids pancake mix or any baked treat we make. It's flavorless and easy to mix. I've tried many different protein powders and this one is the best. Well worth the price if your priority is health - what's more valuable than that?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Using it each day and it works for my joints.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed it with cocoa powder and some other protein powder in my almond milk each morning. No funny taste, but it did made my shake creamy. I've gone through my first purchase and I've notice that my joints feel better after a day of heavy labor. Going to refill my purchase of bone broth powder. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mahlmann

customer_reviews.title: seems fine
customer_reviews.text: Although it is difficult to tell how some supplements are working, this bone broth powder seems fine. I put it in a protein shake and it mixes well. Little to no taste, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Arnold

customer_reviews.title: This is the third bottle I consume
customer_reviews.text: I want to have a cup of soup with my meal. I just add several beef balls, or a piece of organic chicken thigh to 1 1/2 cup of water, heat it up to boiling point, then add a teaspoon of the bone broth, and stir it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great results for digestive issues!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Left Coast Organic Bone Broth protein powder, with great results for my digestive issues, but was concerned because I had heard that some broth products can contain high amounts of lead. I contacted the company and was happy to learn that they test their product and found it to be safe levels for heavy metals.
customer_reviews.author: Rina Bell

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Your Health Regimen!
customer_reviews.text: I was simply amazed how delicious the taste was albeit unflavored. I had no problem adding it to my daily smoothies .Cant help noticing how deprived I have been all this time. Only recently been made aware of the many health benefits of bone broth. Have made a friend for life!
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean empress

customer_reviews.title: K
customer_reviews.text: You have to use a blender. Add a banana and some smoothie mix and it’s good? Il

customer_reviews.title: The only product better than Left Coast Performance Bone Broth Protein Powder is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only product better than Left Coast Performance Bone Broth Protein Powder is Left Coast Performance ORGANIC Bone Broth Protein Powder! This mixes well when I blend it into smoothies and I can feel the difference when using this powder versus other protein powders I've tried in the past. I'm glad to be ingesting a powder from a cleaner source. A superior product without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: I’m on my third canister.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that it has softened my skin and plumped it a bit as collagen is suppose to do. I mix some in my hot coffee and some in my protein shake. I took it to build my gut wall. And I only use organic products.
customer_reviews.author: PK Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this bone broth
customer_reviews.text: I love this bone broth! It has a pleasant taste, which I have not found to be true with some other products I have used. Organic is a must, and I'm so glad to support this family-owned business!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the organic grass fed beef bone broth in my smoothies. I blend it along with other great natural ingredients to get a well rounded start to my day. Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive yet good quality
customer_reviews.text: Rather Expensive. Is does have a milder flavor and blends well.

customer_reviews.title: Pure Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find nutritional products that have not been adulterated to make ignorant consumers happy. This product stands on its own - pure, simple, and clean. It's been helping me improve my overall health, and I'm grateful this company offers such a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Organic Bone Broth Proteins and found this one to be the best so far. I highly recommend this product. It's part of my daily shake. Nice flavor, tasty and easily blended.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I mix this into my morning coffee with coconut milk and it is divine! This was recommended to me by my holistic health practitioner, who is very particular about what she endorses, so I know that I'm getting the best ingredients with this product.

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn't blend smoothly.

customer_reviews.author: woodrow williams

customer_reviews.title: Good protein source for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use a scoop of this in a smoothie whenever I don't have time to fix a meal. Neutral flavor, and it mixes fine in the blender.

customer_reviews.title: The smell is not overwhelming. In fact, it’s barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.text: It blends easily into liquids. Love that’s all organic protein.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered Left Coast Organic Bone Broth Powder several times. No problem mixing in oat milk on low in my Vitamix then adding fruit. I especially like the fact that it is pretty much flavorless and not at all gritty.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bone Broth Protein Powder I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protein powder! I wanted to try a bone broth protein powder but wanted one that was grassfed and organic. This is the only one I could find that was grassfed and certified organic and as a bonus made in USA from USA cattle! I use it in soups and baked goods like muffins and breads and it does not change the flavor or texture but adds an excellent boost of protein and collagen. Can't wait to try it in smoothies! Thanks to the company for a great grassfed and organic product sourced from the USA. I will be buying this again.

customer_reviews.title: best of all
customer_reviews.text: To those who find this "clumps"...try using a blender. I put about 5 cups of filtered water (I use RO water) into my Vitamix, spin the water on ultra-high until it warms up, drop the speed down to low enough so the water is only spinning a little bit, add 3 scoops of broth powder and let it mix for about 30 seconds. It will be quite foamy. I pour it into a pitcher and let it set for as long as it takes for the foam to disappear. This method makes about 3 20-oz mugs of broth and, best of all, no clumping!
customer_reviews.author: Shad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pure & has no "junk" in it so i feel really happy with that aspect of the product, but it is weird tasting (very blandish with a mild odd flavor) and it does not dissolve well in a cool/cold liquid at all! I wanted to use as my Post-Workout protein shake (& stop the WHEY). Unfortunately, this mostly sticks to the bottom of the shaker, or the top strainer part. So i tried putting it in my coffee instead, and it NOT dissolve well in that either (which really surprised me because i though HEAT would do the trick. Probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MissyMe

customer_reviews.title: It's Organic and "Grass-Fed"
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find a product to add to my healthy morning smoothie as my practitioner said I wasn't getting enough protein. Some products had a lot of additives that I didn't want. This protein powder has worked well for me. I heat up a cup of water in my microwave and then pour it over the powder already in a separate cup. I mix it up and then pour it into my NutriBullet large cup and it gets all mixed up with my other ingredients. It's a bit expensive but the high quality is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Product clumps
customer_reviews.text: This product does not easily dissolve. I boiled water & tried mixing for 15 minutes over a hot stove. Large clumps covered the top of my pan. I had to strain the broth to drink. Hopefully it will work better in the mixer?
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Company is honest and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Sunday, 3-8-2020. Hello, I was using their "regular" version, and just started their organic one. I have not had any adverse reactions that I can see. I am able to go along with the flavor, and I should know if this product is doing me good things later on, since results take time to show itself. Their customer service is quick, honest, and reliable which leaves me a great feeling. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: thearcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff in my coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I take it for EFA's and better health. I use it daily in my coffee and it gives it a bit more flavour than just regular cream or milk. It dissolves the best when in hot liquid, in my experience. This is not meant to be eaten in powder or by itself, it will not have good taste, people, so don't complain about the taste when it is not meant to be eaten alone. I feel healthy when I eat it, knowing that it is certified organic and grass fed. Hopefully it gets so popular that it drives the price down.
customer_reviews.author: Glow Girl

customer_reviews.title: You need to use the full measuring cup in a ...
customer_reviews.text: You need to use the full measuring cup in a cup of hot water, You get a full taste of broth. This is very enjoyable, expensive but a very genuine product. It clumps at first but I can dissolve it with a spoon , no need for blender.
customer_reviews.author: WhatIknow

customer_reviews.title: 4 Month Review
customer_reviews.text: Great mixed with coffee, no taste. My husband warms almond milk, mixes powder, then adds coffee for a morning latte. I like it with cold water and a drop of vanilla. Does have a slight flavor with water but easily masked and/or tolerated. We are monthly subscribers. Also mixes well with other protein powders. My husband uses it more and he definitely has noticed a difference in his joints (works construction and is in his 40's) and I have noticed a difference in his skin (more youthful).
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Few Things Taste this Bad
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to rate this product on health benefits or ingredient quality because I find it undrinkable. This product can be made into a broth or mixed into a smoothie, but either way, it tastes so bad that I find it unusable. I hate to give it such a low rating because for those without taste buds, it might be very beneficial. Unfortunately, I'll never know because I am going to throw it out. For a smoothie, it definitely requires a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several other protein powder products, and this has been, by far, the best I have experienced. I love that you get a substantial serving of bone broth protein, (which is also excellent for your gut), and it blends so well with my smoothie or any other drink. There isn’t an aftertaste like some other products and it adds a creamy consistency that bubbles up like a latte. I have also enjoyed it blended with just almond milk, over ice. I am on my second order, and I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: DS108

customer_reviews.title: Great grass fed bone broth powder
customer_reviews.text: I live this protein powder. It tastes great- I add a little stevia and cacao powder to it and some macadamia nut milk and it honestly tastes like a malted milkshake.the best way to keep it from frothing is to mix the other ingredients and then add the bone broth protein last and blend it on LOW. I feel a lot better using this knowing that it comes from grass fed cows, and it’s helped my digestion, and allowed me to maintain lean muscle mass.
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: Organic Grass Fed Beef Bone Broth Protein Powder - 16oz, 20 Servings. Unflavored, Pure. Keto Friendly Protein Powder. Paleo, USDA Certified Organic, Left Coast Performance
feature_bullets: 16oz [By weight] USDA Certified ORGANIC, GRASS FED BONE BROTH PROTEIN POWDER: 100% Pure Beef Bone Broth Protein Concentrate containing no extra carbs or sugars. Unlike other protein powders, our formulation focuses on pure ingredients that heal the gut. That means we've avoided ingredients that can potentially cause stomach upset, like guar gums or xantham gums, which other companies use as a thickening agent.
PRODUCT MUST BE BLENDED: Product should be blended on LOW setting to avoid foaming. Add the powder AFTER all other ingredients are blended, and blend on "low".

GUARANTEED PURITY: Our Beef Bone Broth Protein Powder is 100% Pure and manufactured at a GMP facility in the USA. We stand apart from other companies by ensuring that each batch is created using a low-heat, time consuming process. Comes in our BPA Free, Food Grade PET Plastic Container.
21g of Protein: Paleo Friendly, NON-GMO, Gluten Free, Dairy Free

DIRECT TO CONSUMER SALES ONLY MEANS BIG SAVINGS: We are a small family company that takes pride in delivering the finest quality Bone Broth Protein Powder. We skip the middle man and are not bound by the pricing of big box retailers. It also means that we are able to deliver a premium Bone Broth Protein Powder that would normally sell for well over $70, for much less! You won't find a better price for the quality.
